ScenarioDef.label: Oni tribe survivors
ScenarioDef.description: You are a small group of survivors that are the last of your tribe. The others have been taken by the sky people, their fates unknown, but feared they may ultimately be sold as exotic pets, as livestock or worse. You will now set out to build a new home and then protect it from the sky people who will come again.

scenario.summary: Five Oni survivors attempt to rebuild. Difficult, Oni are slow researchers.

li.text:
The sky people came from every direction and destroyed what was left of your declining tribe. With no aid to assist a dying tribe, most of the remaining warriors were drafted for the last stand in an attempt to buy time for perhaps a few to attempt an escape.

You were some of those that managed to escape, and the chief's last orders were to forget about them and prayed for your fate to not end like them.

After a long harrowing journey, the survivors finally come to a stop with no one left pursuing them. All left to do, is to build a new home, and perhaps, a revival of your lost tribe.

ScenarioDef.label: Escaped Oni
ScenarioDef.description: You and a few others managed to break out of your cells of from a ship bound for a Glitterworld where you were to be sold as exotic pets. During the commotion, you manage to steal some of the sky people's materials and equipments, including a few of their basic technology blueprints, and escaped using their ship's drop pod to the habitable planet that is passing by.

scenario.summary: Three escaped Oni with industrial start - nearly classic RimWorld experience.

li.text: Having made a great escape within the drop pod, as it descends down through the atmosphere, you can only wonder how you are going to survive down on this rim world and if you can ever truly return home, or perhaps choose to settle down in this new home to hide from the sky people that took you in the first place.

ScenarioDef.label: Wild Oni awakening
ScenarioDef.description: After an undetermined amount of time, your intelligence returns, unable to remember the traumatizing ordeal that flipped your mindset to be that of an animal. You're alone, confused and totally unprepared. Can you survive?\n\nWarning: There is nothing fair about this scenario - it is extremely difficult and death can happen for any reason.

scenario.summary: Alone, confused and utterly unprepared. Can you survive? Extremely difficult and unfair.

li.text: You managed to survive with an animalistic mindset, something easy to do as an Oni, but what made you stressed and insane enough to act like that?\n\nUnable to remember the traumatizing ordeal, you must now prepare to settle into a new home in the wilderness and expect the worse should others come capture you. At least you are aware those sky people will treat you as a slave, livestock or an exotic pet.
